message.body: hey lauren. I am richard and i am in ceramics 1. I got a question. my low fired piece is broken and i was thinking of glueing it. is there a specific glu
e that works better with clays or should i just get a super glue? thx
yes, diane can advise you on which epoxy glue to use, but if you're planning to glaze the piece you have to do that first, high fire it, and then glue it.
